Articles.Content:
Does anyone know if this Mark IV Space plane system mod is going to be updated for KSP version 1.3?

Also looking for B9 Aerospace parts pack and OPT Spaceplane updates for KSP 1.3

Edited June 10, 2017 by Emperor Matthius

Updating mods takes time, especially in the case of of the Mk IV parts since Nertea has about 10 other mods to update.  As for them getting updated I don't know about the others but the Mk IV parts should be getting an update, I just don't know when since Nertea is focused on getting the 1.3 updates for Near Future Technologies tested and published.
